channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Wrong Way to Handle the China Threat
item.description: The hazy deal announced by President Trump is, at best, a temporary reprieve snatched out of defeat.

item.title: Democratic governors will defend immigration policies before Republican-led House panel
item.description: As President Trump spars with California's governor over immigration enforcement, Republicans in Congress are calling other Democratic governors to th...

item.title: Standoff with troops in Los Angeles reignites old feud as Newsom resists Trump's immigration raids
item.description: It was earlier this year that California Gov. Gavin Newsom was making nice with President Donald Trump as he sought help for his wildfire-battered sta...

item.title: SBC Passes Resolution Demanding FDA ‘Immediately Revoke’ Mifepristone Approval
item.description: The resolution acknowledges the abortion pill causes unborn babies deaths and ‘physical, emotional, and spiritual harm to the mother.’

item.title: New Evidence Suggests FBI Agent Involved With Crossfire Hurricane Was Foreign Spy
item.description: A former FBI agent quickly pled guilty to corruption-related crimes. His prosecution and admission seem suspiciously tidy.

item.title: Same-Day Registration Is Too Easily Gamed By Leftists
item.description: Same-day registration has become a way to flood the zone with mystery voters — officials lack the time to validate registrations.

item.title: When Faith Meets Stoicism, There’s Hope For Us All
item.description: In his new book, 'After Stoicism,' Baylor professor Thomas M. Ward aims to renew interest in Roman philosopher Boethius.

item.title: Forgetting the Denominator
item.description: Where Eicher fails in an otherwise admirable volume is in her decision to praise Churchill too much, and explain Mellon too little.

item.title: Feds bring first spit-and-hit charge against illegal immigrant in Los Angeles
item.description: Federal prosecutors charged an illegal immigrant with spitting on an ICE officer who was arresting him this week, making good on President Trump's vow...

item.title: Trump says he will assign tariffs to nations in the coming weeks
item.description: President Trump says he is ready to assign tariff amounts to countries that are unable to reach trade deals with the U.S. by a July deadline.

item.title: House will vote on Trump's request to cut funding for NPR, PBS and foreign aid
item.description: House Republicans are moving to cut about $9.4 billion in spending already approved by Congress as President Donald Trump's administration looks to fo...

item.title: Utah Has Found the Right Middle Ground on Artificial Intelligence
item.description: We don’t have to choose between innovation and safety. With the right structure, we can have both.

item.title: The Government Is Not Going to Save Hollywood
item.description: Subsidizing film and television production only props up an obsolete system.

item.title: Texas Is Right to End the Heartland Flyer
item.description: The state-supported Amtrak service is a terribly inefficient way to transport 200 people per day.

item.title: Sending Federal Law Enforcement To Quell California Is Both Legal And Necessary
item.description: Deploying the National Guard is not an overreach but a measured response to a crisis that local leaders have failed to address.
